author: danceratopz
content:
Dimitry, could you create the tarball to unpack as:
```
fixtures_ethereum_tests/.meta/index.json
fixtures_ethereum_tests/state_tests/  # contains contents of GeneralizedStateTest
fixtures_ethereum_tests/blockchain_tests/ # contains contents of BlockchainTests
```
You can include the tag in the diretory base name if you want.

author: daniellehrner
content:
When I run the execution spec tests (v4.1.0) I always get the following error at the end:
```
Error loading fixtures from fixtures/blockchain_tests/byzantium/eip198_modexp_precompile/modexp/modexp.json
/Users/daniel/projects/execution-spec-tests/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/_pytest/main.py:306: PluggyTeardownRaisedWarning: A plugin raised an exception during an old-style hookwrapper teardown.
Plugin: terminalreporter, Hook: pytest_sessionfinish
```
It seems because of that the test report is not generated correctly. Does anybody know how to fix that?
